text: Been a long time since I last drank the kopi here and it is still fantastic. My favourite stall for local kopi & tea. Very aromatic and just the right balance.

Always long queue but moves pretty fast. Had my kopi-o por which came abit thicker than usual but had a nice aroma. At 90cts, it is cheaper than the other stall opposite the mall which charged me $1.10 for a small cup.

16.7.24 Ordered the kopi o por egg set for $2.90. Por is still thick but nice.
Local coffee stall run by kind friendly couple, at affordable prices. Queue often looks long, but they are fast. Do support them when at Kovan Hawker Centre!
Need to queue.  The price is quite cheap. Taste is strong and bold.

The best coffee stall in Kovan Food Center. Beside the good coffee, the pricing of $0.60 per cup is really amazing.
Expects long Q if you visit during busy lunch or dinner period.
